SEARCH
Package org.jlab.phaser.model

Class JobFilter

java.lang.Object
org.jlab.phaser.model.JobFilter
public final class JobFilter extends Object
An immutable job query filter.

Individual filter parameters are ignored if null. The parameters which are not null are combined with SQL "and".

    • toHumanWhereClause

      public String toHumanWhereClause(String timestampFormat)
      Return the human readable where clause based on this filter. This is useful for echoing the user's selection.
      Parameters:
      timestampFormat - The SimpeDateFormat timestamp format to use
      Returns:
      The where clause

    • toSqlWhereClause

      public String toSqlWhereClause()
      Returns the SQL where clause based on this filter. The clause can be used in a PreparedStatement as it uses "?" where parameters go.
      Returns:
      The where clause

    • assignStatementParameters

      public void assignStatementParameters(PreparedStatement stmt) throws SQLException
      Assigns prepared statement parameters for the SQL where clause returned from toSqlWhereClause.
      Parameters:
      stmt - The PreparedStatement
      Throws:
      SQLException - If unable to assign the parameter
